effect.x-y: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

short_effect.x-y: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

flavor_text.x-y: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
